mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT OUT_NO ORDER_NO, OUT_DATE ORDER_DATE, STORE_NO STORE_NO, EMP_CODE EMP_CODE FROM STORE_OUT_PRODUCT ORDER BY OUT_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_OUT_PRODUCT ( OUT_NO, STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, OUT_EA, EMP_CODE) VALUES ( #{ORDER_NO}, #{STORE_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{ORDER_EA}, #{EMP_CODE})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM STORE_OUT_PRODUCT WHERE OUT_NO = #{ORDER_NO}) as isChk;
